name: a-multi-layer-honeypot-infrastructure-with-real-time-ml-external-threat-intelligence-fusion
description: HoneyTrace is a multi-zone honeypot system designed to detect, log, enrich, and analyze attacker behavior. It includes a fake Git server, CI/CD runner traps, real-time logging backend, Isolation Forest anomaly detection, HoneyDB threat intelligence lookup, and a React-based FSOCIETY dashboard for visualization.
